Remaining text in the page: # Tasmay Pankaj Tibrewal 

## Research Work

Harvard University | Research Internship | Prof. Vijay Janapa Reddi | LLM for Hardware Design May '24 - Jun '24

- Optimized performance of lightweight open-source models like GPT Neo, Llama 3.1 8b, Mixtral 8x7b through SFT, RLHF on high-quality SQuAD, QuArch and custom datasets, achieving performance comparable to GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet
